CssProperty.name: glyph-orientation-horizontal
CssProperty.description: Sets or retrieves a value that alters the orientation of a sequence of characters relative to an inline-progression-direction of horizontal.

CssProperty.name: glyph-orientation-vertical
CssProperty.description: Sets or retrieves a value that alters the orientation of a sequence of characters relative to an inline-progression-direction of vertical.

entry.description: Sets the orientation based on the fullwidth or non-fullwidth characters and the most common orientation.

CssProperty.name: kerning
CssProperty.description: Indicates whether the user agent should adjust inter-glyph spacing based on kerning tables that are included in the relevant font or instead disable auto-kerning and set inter-character spacing to a specific length.

entry.description: Indicates that the user agent should adjust inter-glyph spacing based on kerning tables that are included in the font that will be used.
